data.text:
#hiring #c2c #benchsales #vendorlist #contract #onsite #dataanalyst #DataAnalyst #Philadelphia, PA – #Onsite (#localcandidates ) #Contract Job Description: 1. Data Storytelling: • Drive the storytelling process by weaving insights from data visualizations into coherent narratives that support decision-making processes. • Craft compelling narratives based on industry best practices and Telecom guidelines. • Be a confident presenter capable of effective communication to executives. 2. Actionable Insights: • Leverage data to drive actionable insights and solutions for the business. 3. Data Extraction and Analysis • Utilize advanced SQL querying techniques to extract, clean, and analyze large datasets from various sources. • Design and create visually appealing and informative dashboards, graphs, and reports using visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar. 4. Communication and Functional Domain experience: • Understand Telecom business functions around Order Management based on past experience. • Present complex findings and insights to diverse stakeholders, including senior leadership, in a clear, concise, and compelling manner. #inboxme or #shareresume at simranjeet@tanishasystems.com Shilpa B.Himanshu AroraAkash SharmaAkash VermaNavneet Kumar ✅Bhawesh KaushikBhupendra ChauhanHarsh MauryaSatyesh Bharadwaj

Hello Everyone, Direct client requirement I’m #hiring. Know anyone who might be interested? Hey Folks! Hi I’m #hiring. Know anyone who might be interested? You can share your resume at priya.gupta@quantumworldit.com Title: #Data Analyst Location: #Mountain View CA (#hybrid) #LOCAL ONLY Must have : Good experience with identify KPIs, understanding nuances of dashboard, building dashboards using Tableau, good knowledge of SQL. AB testing, cohort analysis. Roles and Responsibilities: ● Describe and manipulate data sets, sources, and structures. Develop reports to make data more meaningful to business initiatives, analyze data quantitatively and qualitatively and communicate findings. ● Develop data models to transform raw data into meaningful insights ● Design, develop, and deploy dashboards using Tableau. #hiring #c2chiring #benchsales #vendor #hotlist #localonly #CA #dataanalystjob #c2cjobs

In my recent role as a Data Scientist, I had the privilege of delving deep into data analytics, and the results were nothing short of extraordinary. Specifically, we identified a pivotal data trend that led to a transformative breakthrough. Through meticulous analysis of extensive datasets, we pinpointed a growing demand for a specific algorithm within our machine learning models. We swiftly adapted our data modeling techniques to incorporate this critical element, and the impact was nothing short of astonishing. We observed a significant boost in model accuracy and predictive power, resulting in a remarkable 15% improvement in our model's performance within just six months. This experience underscored the paramount importance of data-driven insights in the realm of machine learning and data science, emphasizing the need for adaptability in response to evolving data dynamics.
